I'm sorry to break your storyline, but if I can speak for both Rauq 
and Rudra, there will be no humans (why proto anyways) getting more 
than superficial implication in the rpg. I can understand about 
nebulan or vok characters since they are able to match Cybertronians, 
but no humans. We have to be realistic sometimes.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> I just had a brain storm today.  LN says we need
> something new, well what if we had a group of
> Transformer slave traders land and start capturing
> Proto-humans.  The down side is the council would have
> to withdraw the Proto-humans can't fight rule.
> 
> --- Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
